data.description: As an asynchronous event-driven JavaScript runtime, Node.js is designed to build scalable network applications.

faqs.question: Who is this course designed for?
faqs.answer: This course is designed for individuals interested in learning the fundamentals of web development. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some experience with coding, this course is suitable for anyone looking to build websites from scratch.

faqs.question: What are the career opportunities with proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JS?
faqs.answer: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript opens up a wide range of career opportunities in web development, including front-end development, full-stack development, UI/UX design, and freelance web development.

faqs.question: Is course access available after it ends?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll maintain access to the course content indefinitely, even after the course concludes.

tabs.title: Why HTML, CSS & Javascript
tabs.content: Learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is essential for web development, offering versatile skills, career opportunities, creative expression, and a foundation for continuous learning.

tabs.title: Why HTML, CSS & Javascript from CKlassrooms
tabs.content: Learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript from CKlassrooms offers structured courses, expert instruction, practical projects, and a supportive team, enabling efficient skill development and career advancement in web development.

tabs.title: Pre-requisite
tabs.content: An interest in web development and basic computer skills are sufficient to start learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
